value.title: Microsoft Azure Security Center for IoT
value.excerpt: Learn about Microsoft Azure Security Center’s new IoT capabilities. Azure is now the first major public cloud with end-to-end security for IoT with enhancements to three key services. Azure Security Center can now be used to implement security best practices and mitigate threats for entire IoT projects

value.title: Migrate and modernize your .NET applications on Azure | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Azure App Service hosts over 2M web apps with a fully managed app hosting platform for .NET, Node, Python, and Java web apps. In this episode, Gaurav Seth shows Scott Hanselman what's new in Azure App Service. Gaurav demos the new Premium V3 Plan with newer and faster hardware and lower pricing, ability

value.title: Multiple node pools in Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Saurya Das joins Scott Hanselman to show how multiple node pools for Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) enable you to use different virtual machine sizes in a node pool supporting a variety of workloads in a single AKS cluster. For example, an e-commerce website can have a node pool for a billing service

value.title: Scaling with Service Fabric Mesh | Azure Friday
